name: Abbess

skills.name: Arrow of Rebuke
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Removes 1 random debuff from this Champion and places it on the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Mass Impalement
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5'
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +109
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Divine Wrath
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Damage inflicted is proportional to either this Champion's ATK or the target's DEF or ATK stat, whichever is highest.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
